record.jsxtip: Fires after the user clicks this stack to open it or after an equivalent event.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event; null if this event is invoked with doShowStack().

record.jsxtip: Fires after this stack is made visible within the parent stack group.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this stack is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this stack before it is removed from the DOM.
